Method.name: SetUserData
recordUser
Method.Description:
uzivatelska data pro kazdy zaznam (result, detail, basket)
implementovat pouze v zakaznicke tride i2.cust.xxx.result

26.01.23 ln; metoda downloadAll

Method.name: downloadAll
Method.Implementation:
s class=$$$HandleClass(handle), t001=$$$HandleT001(handle)
d ##class(content.api).selectRecAll(.output,class,t001) q:'$d(output)
s item="", files="" f { s item=$o(output(item)) q:item="" s repo=output(item,"repository") s key=output(item,"key") s mode=##class(content.api).engineRead(repo,key,.array) continue:'mode
s type=$g(array("type")) ; TODO omezit select dotaz continue:type'="content"
s size=$g(array("size")) continue:size>104857600 ; prakticky limit 100MB
s files=files_" "_##class(content.csg2).getLink(repo,key) }
s:$l(files," ")>2 data("RECORDS",seq,"downall")=$e(files,2,*)

Method.name: preHTTP
Method.Description:
Vola se pri OnPreHTTP metode CSP
vraci retezec pri chybe
